This is a fine musical with a timeless score by one of my favorite composers (Gershwin) and a nice 'Parisien' atmosphere which gives the Boston Opera Company an excuse to build its new wonderland ,which since 1980 , has been for me the finest place to see an opera.
The Pré-Raphaelites and a few good plays with or without any music all offered an evening of good, nay great, theatre for which I am very grateful.
